```r
# find non-zero counts
nonZero <- (counts(sce) > 0)
# find rows/genes with at least one non-zero count 
keep <- (rowSums(nonZero) > 0)
# keep only the genes with non-zero count the SCE object 
sce_2 <- sce[keep, ]
# explore sce_2
sce_2
```
